comment: Very tough grader and doesn't take late work at all. Isn't polite, doesn't explain assignments, changes due dates/ doesn't use blackboard well so it's easy to miss assignments by accident because he moves them around.

very social professor! He is unique in the way he speaks and presents math, but its one of the bests ways to learn. Its also one of the many reasons he is loved. Don't take aleks for granted, aleks is much better than what other universities use especiallly against pearson.

So it was his second-semester teaching at my school and it was a mess. He is one of the most dedicated teachers I've had but his broken English is hard to understand especially when you barely understand the math. He is a great guy but I taught myself more than he did. I only took his class because it was the last open math class. Don't take this.

His accent is very heavy which makes him hard to understand but if you go for help individually he will take the time to help you succeed in his class. Study guides matched the tests which made it easier! Take home quizzes that were easy 100s. Aleks was a pain but make sure to do well on the first knowledge test so you dont have a lot of topics.

He doesnt explain things super well but he works through the problems so if you can follow that then you should be good. He is super willing to work with you to get a good grade by letting you redo things and offering help. He also cracks the occasional joke ��

Decent professor. Procrastination is your worst enemy for this class. The quizzes are take home and the test are identical to the review he makes. The part I hated about this class was ALEkS. It's a real chore, especially since maybe 2% of the material on it is actually on the test. Once you get past that and his accent, he's not a bad professor.

He is a very good professor once you get past his accent. Tests are just like the review and quizzes are take home. He always lets you make up your tests and he really cares about your grade. He is super funny and always wants to make the class laugh. 11/10
